original_text: One night, Joseph had a dream and he told his brothers about it. When they heard about the dream, Joseph's brothers hated him even more than they did before.
korean_text: 요셉이 꿈을 꾸고 자기 형들에게 말하매 그들이 그를 더욱 미워하였더라

sentences.original_text: One night, Joseph had a dream
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 밤, 요셉은 꿈을 꾸었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he told his brothers about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것에 대해 형들에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: When they heard about the dream
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 꿈에 대해 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: even more than they did before
